clean_data: Java Developer span lJavaspan span lDeveloperspan Java Developer Richmond Hill GA Around 5 years of experience in all the phases of software development life cycle that includes Requirement Study Analysis Design Development Integration maintenance installation implementation and testing of various clientserver and Ntier web applications Extensive development experience specializing in environment building ntier applications using JAVA J2EE Net MVC Spring Struts Hibernate JavaScript HTMLHTML5 CSSCSS3 Angular JS React JS Oracle SQL Experience with XML SAX DOM SOAP web services WSDL and Restful web services Experience in implementation of JAVA application data access tier with JDBC SQL etc and manipulating databases eg Oracle 11g MySQL Ms SQL etc Handson experience in OOPS and Multithreading concepts Handson experiences in building application with Maven and Gradle Good experience in coding test cases using JUnit 4 JMock2 Extensive experience in developing UI using HTML CSS Experienced in developing J2EE applications on MVC based frameworks like Spring and Struts Strong working knowledge of Database Programming using SQL PLSQL and Stored Procedures Experience with IBM Web Sphere application server technologies WebLogic JBoss and Apache Tomcat and configuring them Expert in version controlling tools like Git and SVN Excellent written and verbal communication skills presentation and problem solving skills Good team player and have the ability to work in both Agile Scrum and Waterfall environments Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Java Developer CVS Health Scottsdale AZ December 2017 to August 2018 CVS Health provides sales and marketing optimization solutions for life sciences financial services and B2B organizations Specializing in innovative customized technology and services offers the Clear Sky platform Consulting Analytics and Technology Services The project involved the integration of clients data into IMS databases and generate analytical reports for business users Responsibilities Implemented Agile methodology that involved daily sessions with team on progress of iterations Involved in gathering requirements and High Level Design based on requirements Monthly sprint sessions with team to gather requirements Developed Restful API for Web portal Developed portals in Java Designed web pages for Web portal using HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript Angular JS React JS JQuery in frontend and Java functions in the backend Used SQL server for database operations Worked on Voice NT EZ TextingContact Wireless for communications and Twitter APIs for twitter communications Integrated SSRS reports in the web Application using aspx pages Responsible for bug fixing and deploying web portal Deployed portal in Tomcat 70 Developed Restful APIs for Web portal Designed web pages for Web portal using HTML CSS in frontend and Java functions in the backend Used Hibernate 43 with SQL server for database operations Worked on Active Reports and SSRS for developing reports using SQL queries Responsible for bug fixing and deploying web portal in Tomcat server Deployed portal in Tomcat 70 Developed Restful Web services for SOAP client using Jersey 19 to provide access to information through JSON Objects XML Developed web application using Apache Open Office UNO API for mail merge in the backend and JSPs Servlets JavaScript in the frontend Hibernate was used as ORM with SQL Server database Used Jira for tracking issues bugs and improvements in both Java and Net applications Used Eclipse and Visual Studio for application development Used Tomcat as web server for deployment Involved in writing SQL server stored procedures and designing and developing database Involved in writing dynamic queries in SQL Server Developed unit test cases using Junit4 and JMock2 was used for mocking Documentation Training manual of Web portal Documentation Use Cases of portals Environment Java Eclipse JSP Servlet JSON XML Active Reports Gradle 23 Git 19 Open Office Windows Server 2012 JAVAJ2EE Developer Charter Communications Denver CO January 2016 to November 2017 Company Charter Communications Inc is a telecommunications company that offers its services to consumers and businesses under the branding of Spectrum Providing services to over 25 million customers in 41 states it is the secondlargest cable operator in the United States by subscribers and third largest pay TV operator Responsibilities Worked on WLI RLI and BIR applications Analysis design and development of Application based on J2EE using Struts and Hibernate Involved in interacting with the Business Analyst and Architect during the Sprint Planning Sessions Developed Rich user interface using HTML JSP JSTL JavaScript JQuery CSS and WRIA Wells Fargo Rich Interface API Hibernate was used for Object Relational mapping with Oracle database Involved in developing the user interface using Struts tags Integrated Struts and Hibernate ORM framework for persistence and used Hibernate DAO Support with Hibernate Template to access the data Involved in unit testing using JUnit 4 Implemented DAO classes which in turn use JDBC to communicate and retrieve the information from DB2 database sitting on LinuxUNIX server Wrote selenium test scripts for regressive testing the application Involved in fixing the production defects for the application Involved in writing SQL PLSQL stored procedures using PLSQL Developer Used Eclipse as IDE for application development Used Weblogic 100 for application deployment Supported production deployments and validated the flow of the application after each deployment Environment JDK 15 JEE 6 JSP Struts Struts Tags JavaScript HTML SAX JAXB Servlets WRIAWells Fargo Rich Interface API Eclipse IDE Weblogic100 XML CSS MySQL Oracle Maven UNIX JDBC SOAPUI Java Developer Edutech Learning Solutions Pvt Ltd August 2015 to December 2015 Description The company has business interests in engineering construction manufacturing goods information technology and financial services and has offices worldwide Responsibilities Database schema design development and coding of DDL DML statements functions Responsible for designing coding and developed the application in J2EEusing MVC architecture Developed Business components using JavaBeansand database connections using JDBC Configure application flow controlling logic and navigation Designed and developed base classes framework classes and reusable components Designed web pages using JSP HTML Validations for the Client Side were done using JavaScript Performance tuning debugging issues in testing and deployment phases Environment JAVA2 Servlets JDBC HTML JAVA Beans Spring Framework Apache
